chapter.text: 25|1|Shengjie zai an la! Ta jiang shi zhunze gei ta de puren, yibian ta zuo zhong shijie de jinggao zhe.
25|2|Tiandi de zhuquan zhishi ta de; ta meiyou shouyang erzi, zai zhuquan zhong meiyou huoban. Ta chuangzao wanwu, bing jiayi jingmi de zhuding.

25|3|Tamen zhuding chu an la wai chongbai xuduo shenling, naxie shenling buneng chuangzao renhe wu, tamen ziji que shi bei zao de; tamen buneng zhuchi zishen de huo fu, ye buneng zhuchi (taren de) shengsi he fuhuo.
25|4|Bu xindao zhe shuo:“Zhe zhishi tasuo niezao de yaoyan, bie de xuduo ren ceng bangzhu ta.” Tamen yi zuo liao bu yi de shi, yi shuo liao bu yi de miu wang dehua.
25|5|Tamen shuo:“Zhe shi guren de shenhua, ta shi ren chaolu xialai, zhaoxi dui ta songdu.”
25|6|Ni shuo:“Zhidao tiandi de aomi zhe jiang shile ta. Ta que shi zhi she de, que shi zhi ci de.”
25|7|Tamen shuo:“Zhege shizhe zenme ye chifan, ye wanglai yu shichang zhi jian ne? Weihe an la bu paiqian yige tianshi jianglin ta, er yu ta tong wei jinggao zhe,
25|8|huozhe ba yige caibao shangci ta, huozhe ta you yizuo guoyuan, gong ta shiyong ne?” Bu yi zhe shuo:“Nimen zhi shuncong yige bei guhuozhe.”
25|9|Ni kan tamen zenyang wei ni dale xuduo biyu, er tamen ziji wu ru qitu, gu, buneng huode yitiao zhenglu.
25|10|Shengjie zai an la! Ruguo ta yiyu, ta yao shangci ni bi nage geng hao de, ji xia lin zhu he de guoyuan, ta yao shangci ni yixie dasha.
25|11|Buran, tamen fouren fuhuo shi, wo yi wei fouren fuhuo shi zhe yubeile liehuo.
25|12|Dang huo yu cong yuan chu kanjian tamen de shihou, tamen tingjian baolie sheng he taixi sheng.
25|13|Dang tamen bei jiasuozhe touru liehuo zhong yige xia'ai di difang de shihou, tamen zai nali aihao qiu si.
25|14|Jintian nimen buyao aiqiu yisi, nimen dang aiqiu duo si.
25|15|Ni shuo:“Zhe shi geng hao de ne? Haishi yingxu jingwei zhe yong ju qizhong de leyuan hao ne?” Ta shi tamen suoyou de baochou he guisu,
25|16|tamen zai leyuan zhong de xiangshou ziji suo yiyu de (xingfu). Tamen jiang yong ju qizhong, zhe shi keyi xiang ni de zhu yaoqiu shijian de nuoyan.
25|17|Zai na ri, ta yao ba tamen he tamen she an la er chongbai de (ouxiang) jihe qilai, ranhou shuo:“Jiujing shi nimen shi wo de zhexie puren mi wu ne? Haishi tamen ziji panli zhenglu ne?”

25|18|Tamen shuo:“Women zansong ni chaojue wanwu, women bu gai she ni er jing shi renhe shenling. Dan ni ceng shi tamen ji qi zuxian xiangle, zhidao tamen yiwangle jinian, tamen yuan shi miewang de minzhong.”
25|19|Zhu shuo:“Tamen que yi fouren nimen suo shuo dehua, nimen buneng taobi xingfa, ye buneng zizhu. Nimen zhong shei shi bu yi de, wo yao shi shei changshi yanjun de xingfa.

25|20|Wo zai ni zhiqian suo paiqian de shizhe, meiyou yige shi bu chifan de, meiyou yige shi bu laiwang yu shichang zhi jian de. Wo shi nimen huxiang kaoyan, kan kan nimen neng rennai ma? Ni de zhu shi mingcha de.”
25|21|Bu xiwang yu wo xiang hui zhe ceng shuo:“Zenme bu shi zhong tianshi jianglin women, huo zhe de jian women de zhu ne?” Tamen que yi wangzizunda, que yi danibudao.
25|22|Tamen kanjian zhong tianshi de rizi, fanzui zhe jiang meiyou hao xiaoxi, zhong tianshi yao dui tamen shuo:“(Leyuan duiyu nimen) shi ying wei yanjin de.”
25|23|Wo jiang chuli tamen suo xing de shangong, er shi ta bian cheng feiyang de huichen.
25|24|Zai na ri, leyuan de jumin jiang zai yige zui you de juzhu di, yige zuimei de xiuxi zhi suo.
25|25|Zai na ri, zhu tian jiang yu baiyun yidao polie, zhong tianshi jiang fengming zhuangyan di jianglin.
25|26|Zai na ri, zhenshi de zhuquan shi shuyu zhiren zhu de. Na ri, dui bu xindao zhe shi yige yanku de rizi.
25|27|Zai na ri, bu yi zhe yimian yao shou yimian shuo:“A! Dan yuan wo ceng yu shizhe caiqu tongyi daolu.
25|28|A! Ai zai! Dan yuan wo meiyou yi mou renwei pengyou.
25|29|Jinian ji jianglin zhihou, ta que yi shi wo beiqi ta.” Emo xianglai shi yiqi ren de.
25|30|Shizhe ceng shuo:“Wo de zhu a! Wo de zongzu yi zhe “gulanjing” wei qi wu.”
25|31|Wo zheyang shi mei ge xianzhi, dou you yixie zuiren zuo ta de choudi, ni de zhu zu wei yindao zhe he yuanzhu zhe.
25|32|Bu xindao zhe ceng shuo:“Zenme bu ba quanbu “gulanjing” yici jiang shi ta ne?” Wo nayang ling ling xingxing di jiang shi ta, yibian wo ping ta lai jianding ni de xin. Wo zhujian jiang shi ta.
25|33|Tamen mei xiang ni tichu yi zhong feinan, wo jiu qishi ni zhenli he geng meiman de jieshi.
25|34|Naxie bei pufuzhe jihe yu huo yu zhe di diwei geng elie, shi pianli zhenglu geng yuan de.
25|35|Wo que yi ba jingdian shangci mu sa, bingqie renming ta di gege ha lun zuo ta de zhushou.
25|36|Wo shuo:“Ni lia qu jiaohua naxie fouren wo de jixiang de minzhong.” Zuizhong wo huimiele tamen.
25|37|Nu ha de zongzu fouren shizhe de shihou, wo yan sile tamen, bingqie yi tamen wei shiren de jianjie. Wo yi wei bu yi zhe zhunbeile tongku de xingfa.
25|38|A de ren, sai mo de ren, lan si de jumin, yiji zai tamen zhiqian de ruogan shidai,
25|39|wo yi wei mei yi shidai de ren chanmingguo xuduo biyu, wo huimiele mei yi shidai de ren.
25|40|Tamen que yi jingli na zao e yu de chengshi, nandao tamen meiyou kanjian ta ma? Buran, tamen bu xiwang fuhuo.
25|41|Dang tamen kanjian ni de shihou, zhi ba ni dang zuo xiaobing,(tamen shuo):“Zhe jiushi an la paiqian lai dang shizhe de ma?
25|42|Yao bushi women jianchizhe yao chongbai women de shenling, name, ta jihu shi women pianli tamenle.” Tamen kanjian xingfa de shihou, jiangyao zhidao shei shi pianli zhenglu de.
25|43|Ni gaosu wo ba, yi siyu wei qi shenling zhe, ni neng zuo ta de jianhu zhe ma?
25|44|Nandao ni yiwei tamen daban shi neng tingcong huozhe neng liaojie de ren ma? Tamen zhi xiang shengchu yiyang, tamen shenzhi shi geng mi wu de.
25|45|Nandao ni meiyou kanjian ni de zhu zenyang shenzhan yinying ma? Jiaruo ta yiyu, ta biding shi yinying chengwei jingzhi de. Wo yi taiyang wei qi biaozhi,
25|46|ranhou wo zhujian de shouhui yinying.
25|47|Zhu yi heiye wei nimen de yifu, yi shuimian gong nimen anxi, yi baizhou gong nimen suxing.
25|48|Zhu zai jiang en zhiqian, shi feng xian lai fu xi. Wo cong tianshang jiangxia qingjie de yushui,
25|49|yibian wo jie yushui er shi yi si de dadi fuhuo, bingyong yushui gong wo suo chuangzao de shengchu he renmen zuo yinliao.
25|50|Wo que yi ba yushui fen pei zai tamen zhi jian, yibian tamen jiyi. Dan tamen daban zhi yuan wang'enfuyi.
25|51|Jiaruo wo yiyu, wo bi zai mei zuo chengshi zhong paiqian yige jinggao zhe.
25|52|Suoyi ni buyao shuncong bu xindao zhe, ni yingdang jie ci “gulanjing” er yu tamen nuli fendou.
25|53|Ta jiushi ren liang hai ziyou jiaoliu de, zhe shi hen tian de shui, na shi hen ku de xian shui; ta zai liang hai zhi jian shezhi pingzhang he tifang.
25|54|Ta jiushi yong jing shui chuangzao ren, shi ren chengwei xuezu he yinqin de. Ni de zhu shi quanneng de.
25|55|Tamen she an la er chongbai naxie dui tamen ji wu fu you wu huo de dongxi, bu xindao zhe shi jili fankang ziji de zhu de.
25|56|Wo zhi paiqian ni wei baoxi zhe he jinggao zhe.
25|57|Ni shuo:“Wo duiyu wancheng zhe xiang shiming, bu xiang nimen suoqu renhe baochou, dan wang youzhi zhe neng you ci dadao dadao qi zhuzai.”
25|58|Ni yingdang tuo kao yongsheng bu mie de zhu, ni yingdang zansong ta chaojue wanwu. Ta zuyi che zhi ziji pu minmen de zuiguo.
25|59|Ta zai liu rinei chuangzao tiandi wanwu, ranhou sheng shang baozuo, ta shi zhiren de zhu. Ni yingdang yi ta qingjiao jingming zhe.
25|60|Ruguo youren dui tamen shuo:“Nimen yingdang wei zhiren zhu er koutou.” Tamen jiu shuo:“Zhiren zhu shi shenme? Nandao women yin feng ni de mingling er koutou ma?” Na shi tamen gengjia fangan.
25|61|Shengjie zai an la! Ta ba xuduo gong zao zai tianshang, youzao mingdeng he canlan de yueliang.
25|62|Ta jiushi wei yu juewu huo yu ganxie zhe, er shi zhouye gengdie de.
25|63|Zhiren zhu de puren shi zai dadishang qianxun er xing de; dang yuren yi e yan shanghai tamen de shihou, tamen shuo:“Zhu nimen ping'an.”
25|64|Tamen wei ziji de zhu er tongxiao koutou he li zhan;
25|65|tamen chang shuo:“Women de zhu a! Qiu ni wei women bi kai huo yu de xingfa. Huo yu de xingfa que shi ling ren feichang tongku de,
25|66|que shi elie de zhuchu he jusuo.”
25|67|Tamen yong qian de shihou, ji bu huihuo, you bu linse, jin shou zhong dao;
25|68|tamen zhi qidao an la, bu qidao bie de shenling; tamen bu weibei an la de jinling er sharen, chufei yi zhenli (changming); tamen ye bu tongjian. Shei fan ci lei (zui'e), shei zao chengfa;
25|69|fuhuo ri yao shou jiabei de xingfa, er shouru de yong ju qizhong.
25|70|Wei huiguo erqie xindao bing xingshan zhe, an la jiang gouxiao qi zuixing, er luqu qi shangong. An la shi zhi she de, shi zhi ci de.
25|71|Huiguo erqie xingshan zhe, que yi zhuanxiang an la.
25|72|Tamen bu zuojia jianzheng, tamen ting dao e yan de shihou qianxun de zou kai.
25|73|Youren yi tamen de zhu de jixiang quan jie tamen de shihou, tingjiang zhe bing bu zhuang long zuo xia de zai dahan.
25|74|Tamen shuo:“Women de zhu a! Qiu ni yi women de qi zi er nu wei women de anwei, qiu ni yi women wei jingwei zhe de dianfan.”
25|75|Zhe deng ren neng jianren, yinci jiang shou gaoji de baochou, tamen zai leyuan li, jiang tingjian zhushou he zhu an.
25|76|Tamen jiang yong ju qizhong. Leyuan shi youmei de zhuchu he jusuo.
25|77|Ni shuo:“Jiaruo meiyou nimen de qidao, wo de zhu bing bu guanqie nimen, dan nimen ji yi fouren zhenli, nimen jianglai yao shou wufa jietuo de xingfa.”
